constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 19 (Tuesday, February 2, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. MANN:
H.R. 718.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article II, Section 3 of the United States Consitution,
which states that the President ``. . . shall take Care that
the Laws be faithfully executed.''
[Page H280]

latestAction.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR H333-334, H370)

title: To promote accountability and transparency in future executive orders.
